job_description:
Masters or higher in quantitative fields e.g. statistics math computer science

2+ years of experience in data analysis data wrangling dashboarding and reporting

Experience in data analyses using SQL

Experience in programming/modeling in Python

Understanding of statistical concepts and practical experience applying them (in A|B testing causal inference ML etc.)

Ability to operate collaboratively and efficiently in a fluid ambiguous environment

Ability to handle highly sensitive information;

Effective interpersonal and time management skills

Experience analyzing on-chain crypto data

Data engineering skills with a willingness to perform data documentation work to improve data foundations as needed

Qualifications: Masters or higher in quantitative fields e.g. statistics math computer science
2+ years of experience in data analysis data wrangling dashboarding and reporting
Experience in data analyses using SQL
Understanding of statistical concepts and practical experience applying them (in A|B testing causal inference ML etc.)
Ability to operate collaboratively and efficiently in a fluid ambiguous environment
Ability to handle highly sensitive information;
Effective interpersonal and time management skills
Data engineering skills with a willingness to perform data documentation work to improve data foundations as needed
